detailedDescription: Deletes a specified amount of messages from a channel ranging from 1 to 500, as long as they are no older than 2 weeks.
noMessages: ⛔ You must specify a number of messages to delete.
tooManyMessages: ⛔ You cannot delete more than 500 messages at a time.
14dayLimit: You can only bulk delete messages that are under 14 days old.
